virtual void FdoXmlClassMapping::_writeXml (  GisXmlWriter *  xmlWriter,
const FdoXmlFlags *  flags
)  [virtual]
 

Writes this XML Class Mapping to XML. Called when the element is serialized to XML.

Parameters:
xmlWriter Input write the element to this XML writer
flags Input flags that control the writing of the element.
Returns:
Returns nothing

Reimplemented from FdoPhysicalClassMapping.
